Game

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The BankAccount class keeps track of the account balance of a particular player. Each instance of this class stores the id of the particular bank account, the bank id associated with the account, the balance, and the player associated with the balance.
